Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled across all successful variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in variants where this activity occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants involving pre-approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE measured until the next distinct approval or rejection activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the first subsequent rejection (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, etc.) in rejected variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include at least one rejection loop versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in the most frequent variant (i.e., Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants where resubmission occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to the final Payment Handled in variants with repeated rejections by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that skip BUDGET OWNER approval versus those that include it
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment for domestic declarations (inferred from variants ending directly with Payment Handled after FINAL_APPROVAL)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE measured until the case reaches either a terminal rejection (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE with no resubmission) or Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in variants without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'
